ValidationRule.description: When the COB is synced to HQ, it will be read-only for all users except system Admin.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(!ISNEW() , $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator",$Profile.Name <> "Customer Onboarding Profile",$Profile.Name <> "SignContractPage Profile" ,NOT( ISBLANK(Client_Id__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Customer onboarding cannot be updated.Please contact System Administrator.
